name: Ext_R3_RequestGroup_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.RequestGroup.reason[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestGroup.reason[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestGroup|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Indicates the reason the request group was created. This is typically provided as a parameter to the evaluation and echoed by the service, although for some use cases, such as subscription- or event-based scenarios, it may provide an indication of the cause for the response.
element.comment: `RequestGroup.reasonCode` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `RequestGroup.reasonReference` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
